Package org.restlet.component

Units of software instructions and internal state.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
Component Abstract unit of software instructions and internal state.
Gateway Intermediary component providing transparent encapsulation of other services.
OriginServer Definitive source for representations of resources in a governed namespace.
Proxy Intermediary component, selected by a client, providing encapsulation of other services.
RestletContainer Origin server that contains restlets or maplets.
RestletServer Origin server composed of restlets containers.
UserAgent Request initiator and ultimate recipient of the response.
 

Class Summary
DefaultRestletContainer Default restlet container that can be easily subclassed.
DefaultRestletServer Default restlet server that can be easily subclassed.
 

Package org.restlet.component Description

Units of software instructions and internal state.

Since:
1.0
See Also:
REST dissertation by Roy T. Fielding
